title: okay GD, you complain about balance, so lets try doing it ourselves
body:
I will list 3 champions I think are strong currently, and your job is to nerf them to a happy level.

Rek'Sai
Jarvan IV
Jinx

These are my suggestions, see if you can do better.

---Rek'Sai currently is really strong due to the combination of utility, tankiness, and damage leaves her is a pretty OP spot right now.

that being said, I would nerf her unburrowed q by a. increasing the CD by approximately 40-50% and b. to help ease the pain of that I would increase the AD ratio to 45% (currently 30%) This will allow her to have a bit more burst, but have lower sustained damage, so she can initiate and chunk enemies, but puts her in a position where she can't spam q, which is the source of a lot of her hidden strength, and forces her to rely more heavily on her team mates, making it more advantageous to build tanky/utility based items, like a jungler should.

---Jarvan IV is currently really strong for the same reasons rek'sai is. tanky, damage, utility.

to fix him, I would really just nerf his per level increases across the board. not a lot, but just enough. he has good  hp regen,  hp, armor and mr scaling, even a good aspd scaling

I would also nerf his CDs just a bit. maybe by a second or so across his kit aside from his ult.

---jinx is really strong for pretty obvious reasons. 

first, I would nerf her passive speed buff by at least 1/5 to 1/4 off the starting MS boost

then I would buff her base move speed by 5. no escapes sucks, 5 move speed won't break her.

then I would lower the max aspd increase to 115% (currently 130%) and remove the first attack speed bonus when switching to the rocket launcher.

I would also increase her base armor to between 24-27 and maybe bump the per level increase by 0.2. again, no escapes, if she is weaker, she will need just a bit more to help her live. maybe also increase her base hp increase per level by 2-4
